subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping
lead_paragraph: Luis-Leon Sanchez won the seventh stage of the 95th Tour while speculation rose about Manuel Beltran, a Spanish rider who reportedly tested positive for EPO. Kim Kirchen remained the overall leader.
snippet: Luis-Leon Sanchez won the seventh stage of the 95th Tour while speculation rose about Manuel Beltran, a Spanish rider who reportedly tested positive for EPO. Kim Kirchen remained the overall leader.
